posts.title: Ricardo Kaka
posts.content: Ricardo Kaka was Unstoppable in his Prime!

comments.content: I always feel bad for Kaka for having such a short prime period, unlike Ronaldinho or Robinho, Kaka stayed away from parties and unhealthy life styles, yet injuries has taken out the best of him away from us. he deserves a longer prime
Those who didn’t see Kaka in his prime just won’t understand how good this guy was.
O gol mais bonito do Kaká foi no jogo Brasil x Argentina, arrancando da defesa em alta velocidade até marcar um golaço...
Simply a wonderful midfielder and a world-class dude. The world of football misses him

posts.title: Cristiano Ronaldo
posts.content: THANK YOU, CRISTIANO RONALDO | Real Madrid

comments.content: 451 goals in 438 matches
Came here after the heartbreaking end of Ronaldo's last world cup match ever. You have nothing left to prove in this sport. Thank you CR7 for all the great moments and memories. Stay blessed.
Came as a Prince, left as a King. 👑
Even after Cristiano WC loss we gather here where he showed his class to remember the old good days🐐🇵🇹👑
its unbelievable, he did all this in 1 season
WHO IS HERE AFTER HE WON THE WORLD CUP???
Goal scorer, playmaker, winger, dribbler, passer, freekick scorer, visioner, magician.. what a tallent!
Best dribbler, play maker, vision, goal scorer ,genius, game changer ,free kicker, passer, penalty taker, defender .absolutely 🐐 🔥simply God of football.

posts.title: Pelé
posts.content: Pelé | Rise of the Brazilian Legend | The King of Football | Rising With Soccer

comments.content: pele! pele! pele!🇧🇷❤🇧🇷 This man is the legend of football, respect him.
Pele not known by Football,Football known by Pele ''REAL LEGEND''
Pele is a true Legend who born in Brazil
Sou brazileiro com muito orgulho com muito amor

posts.title: Zinedine Zidane
posts.content: No One Has Matched Zidane's Elegance So Far

comments.content: His football style was not only genius and precise, it was always beautiful to watch. Its like a form of art. He really dances with the ball and is a faster thinker than any of the opponents.         I could watch him play for hours and hours. Absolutely amazing!
What a work of art. The real Van Gogh of football, alongside Ronaldinho. I could spend hours and hours watching this in slow motion!
Zizu and Ronaldinho are the definition of football at its finest form.Magicians with class both in and out of the pitch.
An example of a player who fulfilled his potential. A guy that makes you fall in love with the game.

posts.title: Kylian Mbappé
posts.content: Kylian Mbappé is simply a PHENOMENON

comments.content: if he really want ballon d'or , he need to leave that prison club
Best player in the world
Great player but I’d pick Vini over him.
MONSTRO 🔥

posts.title: Erling Haaland
posts.content: 14 year old Erling Haaland was INSANE

comments.content: He's one of the most clinical finishers I've ever seen, okay his goals aren't spectacular but the level of skill you need to have for his awareness and positioning is insane.
For such age, he is not selfish either. He pass the ball to his teammate whenever  possible
One of the best poachers I've seen since Nistelrooij.There's a lot of effort to discredit his goals as scrappy,but when your team is struggling, you'll be praying for someone to tap it in.
He's neither the second Ronaldo nor second Messi. But, The First Haaland

posts.content: PLAYER CAM | HENRIKH MKHITARYAN VS MILAN

comments.content: Un professionista serio ... sempre forza Inter 👍

Forza INTER! We love you Miki!
